paper_abstract: This article propose a new maturity model with three related dimensions (technological, information quality, and business) and provide its empirical analysis within Slovenian organizations. With the use of K-means clustering, the naturally present maturity groups are identified. This article is an attempt to establish clear directions for further business intelligence development in transition economy settings. The findings hold important implications for commercial enterprise success.
paper_title: Business Intelligence Maturity: The Economic Transitional Context Within Slovenia
